external_games.name: Champions of Shond: Echoes of Faith

name: Champions of Shond: Echoes of Faith
storyline:
Mas and Zel, two agents in the service of Shond, were tasked with a new mission:

The town of Willowbrook has begun exhibiting strange behavior. First, undead began wandering the area, doing unknown tasks and attacking anything that got in their way. Then, demons began raiding the region, kidnapping and murdering at their own will.

While the source of the demons is unknown, the undead were spotted exiting the basement of a temple to Shond. Is this a coincidence, or has the temple to Shond been corrupted by heretical forces? It's up to the two of them to investigate the source and put a stop to it.
summary:
A low-resolution dungeon crawler created for LOWREZJAM 2023.

As two servants of the deity Shond, delve into the dungeons beneath the town of Willowbrook and discover the source of the demonic forces that rise from the depths.
